TEXT.TITLE: LONDON METAL FREIGHTS
TEXT.BODY: Rotterdam/Karachi 20,000/21,000 mt shredded scrap 7,000/1,100 15-30/4. Bin Qasim/Shanghai 25,000 mt pig iron 1,500 fhex/1,200 shex 1-10/4. Chungjin/Manila 4,200 mt steel coils 800/liner discharge 23-30/4. Bilbao/one port Vietnam 5,000 mt steels fio 1,000/500 end April Singapore/Mizushima 6,000/10,000 mt steel scrap fiot 1,200/3,00 2-12/4. Reuter
